message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split. This offers a fair balance considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split. This is a more equitable distribution, reflecting the decreasing value of money, while still ensuring a fair return for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 50/50 split. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
